title: The sole purpose of this Ground Handling is to provide the n…
caption_en: The sole purpose of this Ground Handling is to provide the necessary information, particularly the procedures, associated with the systems that would normally require servicing during a transit.

title: Only crew who have completed the Ground Handling Course are …
caption_en: Only crew who have completed the Ground Handling Course are allowed to carry out this check. A copy of the Transit check sheet is kept in the plastic folder in the Technical Log. Crew are not allowed to clear any defects entered in the Technical Log. Please refer to the Flight Administration Manual (FAM) for the latest updates.

title: Transit checks are to be completed at all transit stops incl…
caption_en: Transit checks are to be completed at all transit stops including training details. This check must be carried out between 2 flights if the aircraft flies several times in a day. Since some of these inspections tests are already included in the Exterior Interior Preflight checks, only those items not covered will be discussed here.

title: Transit Check sheet is as shown above.
caption_en: Transit Check sheet is as shown above.
